p.span: The commitment of the Owendale-Gagetown Area School staff, parents and community is to inspire all students to develop a positive self image and become successful lifelong learners and responsible citizens.
Preschool & Kindergarten graduation will be on their last day of school!

This website, “Owengage.org” is the only official website affiliated with the school District.

Welcome to the new school year and to the home of the Bulldogs. Here you will find a family of DAWGS. Big dawgs and little dawgs, all full of heart. We look forward to serving all of our family members in the year to come. Sign compliments of Evans squared.
